settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences.
settings.profile.title: Profile
settings.profile.description: This is how others will see you on the site.
settings.profile.username_description: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym.
settings.profile.email_description: You can manage verified email addresses in your email settings.
settings.profile.bio_description: Tell others a little bit about yourself.
settings.profile.urls_description: Add links to your website, blog, or social media profiles.
settings.profile.bio_placeholder: Tell us a little bit about yourself
settings.account.title: Account
settings.account.name: Name
settings.account.name_description: This is the name that will be displayed on your profile and in emails.
settings.account.dob_description: Your date of birth is used to calculate your age.
settings.account.language_description: This is the language that will be used in the dashboard.
settings.appearance.title: Appearance
settings.appearance.description: Customize the appearance of the app.
settings.appearance.font_description: Set the font you want to use in the dashboard.
settings.appearance.theme_description: Select the theme for the dashboard.
settings.notifications.title: Notifications
settings.notifications.communication_ema: Receive emails about your account activity.
settings.notifications.marketing_emails_: Receive emails about new products, features, and more.
settings.notifications.social_emails_des: Receive emails for friend requests, follows, and more.
settings.notifications.security_emails_d: Receive emails about your account activity and security.
settings.notifications.mobile_settings: Use different settings for my mobile devices
settings.notifications.mobile_settings_d: You can manage your mobile notifications in the
settings.display.title: Display
settings.display.description: Turn items on or off to control what's displayed in the app.
settings.display.sidebar_description: Select the items you want to display in the sidebar.
settings.password.title: Password
settings.password.current_description: Enter your current password to verify your identity.
settings.password.new_description: Must be at least 8 characters long.
settings.invoice.title: Invoice Settings
settings.invoice.description: Configure your invoice defaults including currency, tax rate, payment terms, and company information.
settings.invoice.default_currency_descri: The default currency for new invoices.
settings.invoice.default_tax_rate_descri: The default tax rate applied to new invoices.
settings.invoice.default_payment_terms_d: Number of days until payment is due.
settings.invoice.company_info_descriptio: Default sender information for new invoices. You can override these when creating individual invoices.
settings.modules.title: Modules
settings.modules.description: Enable or disable system modules. Some modules are required and cannot be disabled.
settings.modules.drag_hint: Drag modules to reorder them in the sidebar.
settings.modules.order_saved_description: Sidebar module order has been updated.
settings.modules.disable_description: Disabling this module will remove its functionality from the system. Other features or modules may depend on it. Are you sure you want to continue?
settings.finance.title: Finance Settings
settings.finance.default_currency_descri: The default currency for new transactions and accounts.
settings.finance.exchange_rate_source_de: The source for currency exchange rates.
settings.finance.fiscal_year_start_descr: The month your fiscal year begins.
settings.finance.number_format_descripti: How numbers are formatted throughout the finance module.
settings.finance.default_smart_input_acc: The default account to use when adding transactions via Smart Input.

page.smart_input.create_account_first: Please create at least one account before adding transactions.

page.smart_input.chat_welcome: Hi! I can help you record transactions. Type, speak, or attach a receipt.

page.advisor.welcome: Hi! I'm your AI financial advisor. Ask me about your finances, budgets, savings goals, or anything money-related.
